akn:section.akn:heading: Working capital fund; availability for centralized personnel data collection and reporting and commo

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 3513a. Working capital fund; availability for centralized personnel data collection and reporting and common regional administrative support services The Working Capital Fund of the Department of Health and Human Services shall on and after January 11, 1971, be available for expenses necessary for centralized personnel data collection and reporting and common regional administrative support services. (Pub. L. 91–667, title II, Jan. 11, 1971, 84 Stat. 2015; Pub. L. 96–88, title V, § 509(b), Oct. 17, 1979, 93 Stat. 695.)
Editorial Notes Codification Section was enacted as part of title II of Pub. L. 91–667, popularly known as the Department of Health, Education, and Welfare Appropriation Act, 1971. Section was formerly classified to section 3510 of this title.
Statutory Notes and Related Subsidiaries
Change of Name “Department of Health and Human Services” substituted in text for “Department of Health, Education, and Welfare” pursuant to section 509(b) of Pub. L. 96–88, which is classified to section 3508(b) of Title 20, Education.
